<a id="OpenXRCompositionLayerEquirect"></a>

# OpenXRCompositionLayerEquirect

**Experimental:** This class may be changed or removed in future versions.

**Inherits:** [OpenXRCompositionLayer](OpenXRCompositionLayer.md) **\<** [Node3D](Node3D.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

An OpenXR composition layer that is rendered as an internal slice of a sphere.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

An OpenXR composition layer that allows rendering a [SubViewport](SubViewport.md) on an internal slice of a sphere.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="OpenXRCompositionLayerEquirect_property_central_horizontal_angle"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **central_horizontal_angle** = `1.5707964` [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRCompositionLayerEquirect_property_central_horizontal_angle)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_central_horizontal_angle**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_central_horizontal_angle**\ (\ )

The central horizontal angle of the sphere. Used to set the width.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRCompositionLayerEquirect_property_fallback_segments"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **fallback_segments** = `10` [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRCompositionLayerEquirect_property_fallback_segments)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_fallback_segments**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_fallback_segments**\ (\ )

The number of segments to use in the fallback mesh.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRCompositionLayerEquirect_property_lower_vertical_angle"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **lower_vertical_angle** = `0.7853982` [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRCompositionLayerEquirect_property_lower_vertical_angle)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_lower_vertical_angle**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_lower_vertical_angle**\ (\ )

The lower vertical angle of the sphere. Used (together with [upper_vertical_angle](OpenXRCompositionLayerEquirect.md#OpenXRCompositionLayerEquirect_property_upper_vertical_angle)) to set the height.

- `void` **set_upper_vertical_angle**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_upper_vertical_angle**\ (\ )
